doc.field: Series V includes all materials from the production of Frank Moore and Jim Self's collaborative film "Beehive" as well as the Boston Ballet production. The series is divided into eight subseries containing the film, video and audio production elements, technical notations and lab related paperwork, production materials corresponding to the Beehive film, production materials corresponding to Beehive the ballet, promotional materials, artifacts, as well as film and video preservation elements and access copies. Subseries A Film and subseries B: technical notations and lab related paperwork are organized chronologically by unique object identification number. Subseries C: Production materials Beehive film, D: Production materials Beehive Ballet, E: Promotional materials and F: Artifacts are organized alphabetically. Subseries G: Preservation elements - film and video and H: Access copies - film and video are organized numerically by unique object identification number.
